EmailTemplate.name: 05_28_2015 OpenStack Webinar Missed.Recording
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry You Missed The OpenStack Primetime Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-webinar-2015&utm_content=05222015> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, We're sorry you missed the OpenStack Primetime webinar yesterday but we get it, things come up. If you would like to view a recording of the OpenStack Primetime webinar simply click the link below and enjoy the webinar whenever it is convenient for you. Eric and Ken had a great discussion surrounding OpenStack, including adoption trends and some great use cases, so make sure to check it out! Best, - The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-webinar-2015&utm_content=05282015>
